name: Pidgeotto

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.text: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokemon.

flavorText: Very protective of its sprawling territory, this Pokemon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

weaknesses: Whirlwind lets opponent choose who to switch
Mirror Move requires being attacked first
counters: Low damage attackers (Mirror Move less effective)

description: Pidgeotto is a Stage 1 Colorless-type Pokemon with utility attacks. Whirlwind forces opponent's Pokemon switch, while Mirror Move returns damage received. Fighting resistance helps against Haymaker.
competitiveHistory: Pidgeotto saw minimal competitive play due to its low HP and damage output. However, its Fighting resistance made it occasionally useful as a tech against Haymaker decks.

rulings.ruling: Whirlwind damage is dealt before the switch occurs.
Mirror Move copies the final damage result, including modifiers like Weakness, Resistance, and PlusPower.
If Pidgeotto was not attacked last turn, Mirror Move does nothing.
